name: Blumpo's Adventure
description:
I would like to thank Thoughtquake from youtube for the Godot rogue-like tutorial.

I modified some of the sprite to make a short and  of fun rogue-like experience.

Try to get the highest score!

A proper rpg of blumpo, or new endra hero is coming out and on rpg architech!

beware of the buple...

dungeons might cause lag, as they are bigger deeper you go.

Enemies may hit harder.  Mind that you don't get clapped!

Coins heal more health, healing potions restore more health while you walk up to 9 steps.
